creator: markieis2
title: Adjustable lamp
description: The project is to create an adjustable lamp using 3D printing and laser cutting techniques. The lamp is designed to be customizable with different plates and easily reproducible.
steps: Print the cube for the lamp on a 3D printer, scaling the Thingiverse design by 18.5 to achieve a 12x12x11.5cm cube. Be careful to use a preheated underground if you use ABS or else you should use PLA otherwise it will bend.
Create a bottom box for the cable using Makercase, with dimensions of 12x12x5cm.
Create plates using vector graphics editor like Adobe Illustrator.
Glue the 3D printed cube onto the top of the cable box, merging them into a single object.
Drill holes to allow the cable to pass through the merged object.
Glue the lamp socket into the 3D printed object to finish the lamp.
